8 Utils

The utils section includes a series of classes which have more specificity than the other ones in the project, with the objective of overwritte some behaviors that is frequently needed to change.

At this moment, we have utils to manage:

  • Alignments
  • Floats
  • Clearfix

8.1 utils.clearfix

Originaly written by Harry Roberts for inuitcss.

Micro clearfix, as per: css-101.org/articles/clearfix/latest-new-clearfix-so-far.php Extend the clearfix class with Sass to avoid the .clearfix class appearing over and over in your markup.

You can use it directly applying the class .clearfix to your HTML if Silent Classes are not active or injecting the placeholder %clearfix in your Sass code using the @extend directive.

.#{$egeo-namespace}u-clearfix,
%#{$egeo-namespace}u-clearfix {
    &:after {
        content: "";
        display: table;
        clear: both;
    }
}
Compatibility IE8+, Firefox 3+, Chrome 4+, Edge 12+, Safari 3.1+, Opera 7+
With !Doctype or IE9 with full support

Variables exposed to theming

Variable Default value Description
$egeo-u-clearfix
true
Whether or not we want to include the clearfix class in the compiled CSS.

egeo-u-clearfix

@mixinTestedinternal

Creates the clearfix pattern from the class which is injected.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

8.2 utils.alignments

A set of mixins, functions and classes to work with alignments. These classes are also available using the non-BEM namespace.

Variables exposed to theming

Variable Default value Description
$egeo-u-tx-alignments true Whether or not we want to include the alignments classes in the compiled CSS.

egeo-u-tx-align($direction: left, $nobem: false)

@mixinTestedinternal

Creates a text-align property in any $direction (left/right/center) and adding !important depending of the $nobem parameter value.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

%egeo-u-tx-align--left, .egeo-u-tx-align--left

@placeholder@class

Set a 'text-align: left;' property.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

%egeo-u-tx-align--left, .egeo-u-tx-align--left

@placeholder@class

Set a 'text-align: left !important;' property.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

%egeo-u-tx-align-right, .egeo-u-tx-align-right

@placeholder@class

Set a 'text-align: right;' property.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

%egeo-u-tx-align-right, .egeo-u-tx-align-right

@placeholder@class

Set a 'text-align: right !important;' property.

%egeo-u-tx-align-center, .egeo-u-tx-align-center

@placeholder@class

Set a 'text-align: center;' property.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

%egeo-u-tx-align-center, .egeo-u-tx-align-center

@placeholder@class

Set a 'text-align: center !important;' property.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

8.3 utils.floats

Provide a series of classes and placeholders to float content to any side. These classes are also available using the non-BEM namespace.

Variables exposed to theming

Variable Default value Description
$egeo-u-floats
true
Whether or not we want to include the floats classes in the compiled CSS.

egeo-u-float($direction: left, $nobem: false)

@mixinTestedinternal

Creates a float property in any $direction (left/right) and adding !important depending of the $nobem parameter value.

Compatibility IE3+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 3.5+

%#egeo-u-float--left, .#egeo-u-float--left

@placeholder@class

Set a 'float: left;' property.

Compatibility IE4+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 7+

%#egeo-u-float--right, .#egeo-u-float--right

@placeholder@class

Set a 'float: right;' property.

Compatibility IE4+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 7+

%egeo-no-bem-u-float--left, .egeo-no-bem-u-float--left

@placeholder@class

Set a 'float: left !important;' property.

Compatibility IE4+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 7+

%egeo-no-bem-u-float--right, .egeo-no-bem-u-float--right

@placeholder@class

Set a 'float: right !important;' property.

Compatibility IE4+, Firefox 1+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 1+, Opera 7+

8.4 utils.text

Provide a series of classes and placeholders to work with text like whitespaces, underlines and so on. These classes are also available using the non-BEM namespace.

Variables exposed to theming

Variable Default value Description
$egeo-u-nowrap
true
Whether or not we want to include the nowrap class in the compiled CSS.

egeo-u-nowrap($nobem: false)

@mixinTestedinternal

Creates a white-space: nowrap; property and adds !important depending of the $nobem parameter value.

Compatibility IE8+, Firefox 3.5+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 3+, Opera 9.5+

%egeo-u-nowrap, .egeo-u-nowrap

@placeholder@class

Set a 'white-space: nowrap;' property.

Compatibility IE8+, Firefox 3.5+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 3+, Opera 9.5+

%egeo-nobem-u-nowrap, .#egeo-nobem-u-nowrap

@placeholder@class

Set a 'white-space: nowrap !important;' property.

Compatibility IE8+, Firefox 3.5+, Chrome 1+, Edge 12+, Safari 3+, Opera 9.5+
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
